select task.id, task.name, task.description, task.creator, task.project, task.plugin_id, task.schedule_interval, task.schedule_unit, task.status, task.plugin_config, task.utc_create_time createTime from task inner join plugin on task.plugin_id = plugin.id
task.is_deleted = false and plugin.is_deleted = false
and task.name ilike ('%' || #{request.name} || '%')
and task.creator ilike ('%' || #{request.creator} || '%')
and task.project ilike ('%' || #{request.project} || '%')
and task.pluginId = #{request.pluginId}
and task.id in ( select task_id from task_group_mapping tgm where tgm.group_id = #{request.groupId})
order by task.utc_create_time desc
select id from task where lower(name) = #{name} and is_deleted = false order by task.utc_create_time desc limit 1
select count(1) from task where lower(name) = #{name} and is_deleted = false
select status from task where id = #{id} and is_deleted = false
